body: Discover and array of specific magic rings,rods, and staves, organized by type and presented alongsidehandy tables organizing them by monetary value, allowingyou to find gear in your price range at a glance. Whether you'rea monk looking for a magic ring to protect you as you chargeunarmored into battle, or a spellcaster eager to dominate thebattlefield with a mighty staff of power, this section is for you.
name: Rings, Rods, and Staves
